posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? 
 I am Applying for Moderator on the NNJG jail Server. 

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone):
 Lindley,ny-eastern standard time. 

4) Current In-Game Name: 
 [NNJG] DJ Nyssie. 

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: 
STEAM_0:1:37705664  
   http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198035677057/ 

6) Email Address:
 REDACTED@REDACTED 

7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server:
 I have been involved In the jail server and the ttt server for nearly 5 monthes now.
 
8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: Moderation in TTT
 I can bring moderation and a great sense of Humor to the jail server, as well as other servers. 

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?:
 Because I've been with NNJG since i started and found it to be great Group and now id like to be a bigger part of than just playing,i want to support the Team and lesser players by helping out with the moderation on the jail server.
 
10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience:
 I have experience with TF2 CS:S and GMod. 

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?:
 I have never had the opportunity to purchase and set up a gmod or css Server but it would be an interesting and challenging task to accomplish.  

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?:
 Yes i have a microphone  i love, and use semifrequently.

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide:
 I will post my recommendations tommorow when my NNJG buddies get online and the server is more active.

once again

This guy would make a great part of the jail moderation. I remember playing with him, he cracked me up. He would make a good mod.

 +support

agreed on the +support
i have played with this guy a lot.he is fun enjoyable and great to have on the server

he seems like a cool guy

You have 3 days to get the reccomendations or this will be locked and denied.
You only need 7 more.
